subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Derek Jeter has seen Yankee rentals come and go, but Joe Torre has always been his Zen center amid The Boss’s chaos theory. But what is Jeter’s world without its core?
snippet: Derek Jeter has seen Yankee rentals come and go, but Joe Torre has always been his Zen center amid The Boss’s chaos theory. But what is Jeter’s world without its core?
